items.value: %00@ was turned upside down for a couple of hours
%00@ was pricked by thousands of needles
%00@ was shown hundreds of tragic images
%00@ was blasted with strange funky sounds
%00@ was forced to smell demonic farts
Thousands of cockroaches were poured into %00@'s chamber
Hundreds of spiders were poured into %00@'s chamber
%125% which made %84b %111%. %00@ gained %112% after the ordeal.
%00@ is in so much pain and suffering right now that torture no longer has any effect on %84b.
